short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will annoy you with a bird.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Annoying Bird is a fun and interactive extension that brings a little mischief to your browsing experience! Watch as a playful bird perches itself on random elements within your viewport, flying away when you get too close. The bird adapts to your page layout, choosing new spots if it leaves the screen. Perfect for adding a touch of entertainment while you surf the web!

Features:

- Interactive Bird Animation: The bird lands on various parts of the page and reacts when you approach.
- Smart Positioning: The bird always selects visible elements to perch on, moving when out of view.
- Toggle On/Off: Easily control the bird’s presence via the extension menu.

Bring a bit of fun to your daily browsing with Annoying Bird! Just watch out — it’s surprisingly good at finding new places to sit!
